name: Gizmo Rabbit
description:
Gizmo Rabbit

Build strange vehicles and fly trough the skies in Gizmo Rabbit! Watch out for the roof-tops and see how long a distance you can travel. 

Concept

Gizmo Rabbit was the result of combining a humanoid rodent with random gizmos and thingamajigs with inspiration from Rube Goldberg machines and the industrial age. Some of the components might help you fly longer, while others grant you more attachment points. See if you can discover all the components, beat your high score, or just build the coolest vehicle in town.

Controls

Use ‘W’ to drive forwards while on the ground and the ‘A’ & ‘D’ keys to adjust rotation while in the air. Some components are interactable with an input indicated in-game, but the input changes as your vehicle grows, so be cautious!
